title: Short-Intensive Course for Developing Sustainability Education Leadership

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and leadership experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening leadership competencies by integrating sustainability into educational programs for science managers/leaders in corporate settings.

learning_goals: Improving the ability to develop implementation plans linking the 17 UN SDGs with corporate training programs
Strengthening project-based problem-solving competencies grounded in sustainability leadership theory
Designing and executing leadership strategies to establish collaborative systems among diverse stakeholders
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
